dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HRES 726 IH: Supporting the recognition of September 16, 2025, as “National Voter Registration Day”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Morelle (for himself, Ms. Sewell, Mrs. Torres of California, and Ms. Johnson of Texas) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Supporting the recognition of September 16, 2025, as National Voter Registration Day.

whereas.text: Whereas September 16th would be an appropriate day to establish National Voter Registration Day: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: supports the designation of National Voter Registration Day; and
encourages each voting-eligible citizen of the United States to—

subparagraph.text: register to vote in his or her respective jurisdiction;
confirm with their appropriate election official that his or her name, address, and other personal identifying information on record is current; and
fulfill his or her civic duty by voting on election day if he or she would like to do so.
